definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: This is one of those rare cases.
sentences.chinese: 本案属于那种极少数案例之一。

sentences.english: Then there are the few brae souls who grab at its horns and hang on at all costs.
sentences.chinese: 只有极少数的灵魂不畏艰险，不惜一切。

sentences.english: Dingoes are one of their few enemies.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚野犬是袋鼠极少数的敌人之一。

sentences.english: Historically, most societies granted rights only to the lucky few.
sentences.chinese: 回顾历史，大多数社会只让极少数幸运者享有权利。

sentences.english: However, we find these circumstances to be rare.
sentences.chinese: 然而，我们发现这样的情况只是极少数。

sentences.english: In rare cases, the intestine perforates and the infant dies.
sentences.chinese: 极少数的个案，出现肠道出现穿孔而导致死亡。

sentences.english: Minnelli is one of the few directors for whom Technicolor seems to have been invented.
sentences.chinese: 明奈利是极少数似乎彩色电影是为他发明的导演之一。

sentences.english: Very few organisations have a truly international structure and perspective.
sentences.chinese: 极少数组织拥有真正国际化的结构和眼界。

sentences.english: The few females afforded respect in Jawa culture are the shamans.
sentences.chinese: 在贾瓦文化中，极少数受尊敬的女性是巫师。

sentences.english: All old houses have stories to be the Government Wenbao Yum Chak's only a very small minority.
sentences.chinese: 所有旧房子的故事，是政府文保荫泽的只是极少数。

sentences.english: Few people commented on the in-the-cloud capabilities announced by Microsoft.
sentences.chinese: 极少数人就微软宣布的计划中功能发表了评论。

sentences.english: There were few primary lymph nodules which devoid of germinal centre in the lymph nodes.
sentences.chinese: 在淋巴结已形成极少数不具生发中心的初级淋巴小结。

sentences.english: However, focal spermatogenesis and severe oligozoospermia have been found in a few cases of 47, XXY, too.
sentences.chinese: 但极少数患者仍有局部生精灶和少量精子发生。

sentences.english: But very few other countries can absorb the US trade deficit.
sentences.chinese: 但是，只有极少数国家有能力吸收美国的贸易赤字。

sentences.english: Very little, if any, debate takes place unless the nominee is controversial.
sentences.chinese: 在极少数情况下，除非被提名者有争议才会进行讨论。

sentences.english: Until this spring, a handful of people knew of his matchmaking project.
sentences.chinese: 直到今年春天，极少数人知道他的牵线搭桥项目。

definition: in large part/the greater part/the majority
just a very few (idiom); tiny number/not many at all/You count them on your fingers.
lit. as rare as phoenix feathers and unicorn horns (idiom)/fig. few and far between
for the most part/on the whole/also pr. [da4 du1]
for the most part/on the whole/metropolitan
Dadu, capital of China during the Yuan Dynasty (1280-1368), modern day Beijing
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
just a very few (idiom); tiny number/just a handful/not many at all/You count them on your fingers.
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
